Well damn that means you have to sneak back inside and get into the kitchen again. It's a good idea though, and you wriggle your way back through the window, landing with an undignified Oomph! on the bed. But when you try to open the door, you find it blocked by a very large object. Dammit V.
==>​ PUNCH V IN THE BALLS | ==>​ Sneak in through the back?

You have punched V in the balls and he returned the favor. There's currently a stalemate over who's the winner of that match, and not one you want to disturb so soon. Sneaking through the back would involve going past the kitchen windows, but it's worth a shot. You weasel out again and run along the side of the house quietly before Youth Rolling your way to the garden.

==>​ Admire V's gardening for a bit.

You stop and smell the roses. They aren't blooming yet, but every year the white and yellow roses turn out beautiful! The carrot plants are doing well since the last time you accidentally discharged in the garden. You pull up one from the soil to check it just in case before watering the plot. You peek over the windowsill to see no one in the kitchen. Carpe diem! You dash into the kitchen, snatching one of the two bowls of pre-boiled spaghetti before continuing to the front door, sending V sputtering as you flash by the couch.
